entry.title: Current Conditions: 22.5°C

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low 17. POP 40%
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then 40 percent chance of showers before morning. Fog developing after midnight. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h overnight. Low 17. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Saturday 10 September 2016

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 25 except 20 along the coast. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers in the morning. 30 percent chance of showers late in the afternoon. Fog dissipating in the morning. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High 25 except 20 along the coast. Humidex 33. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Saturday 10 September 2016

entry.title: Sunday night: Showers. Low 11.
entry.summary: Showers ending in the evening then clearing. Amount 2 mm. Wind southwest 30 km/h becoming northwest 20 in the evening. Low 11. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Saturday 10 September 2016
